content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
- **Offshore pump** at position (-9.5, 19.5) - Working, connected to water system
- **Boiler** at position (18.0, 22.5) - Fueled with coal, steam output at 165°C
- **Steam engine** at position (22.5, 22.5) - Not connected to power network
- **Pipes** (29 water pipes and 10 steam pipes) forming complete fluid system

### Oil Processing Complex
- **Pumpjack** at position (17.5, 40.5) - Not receiving power
- **Oil refinery** at position (27.5, 40.5) - Recipe set to basic oil processing, not powered
- **Storage tank** at position (32.5, 22.5) - Contains petroleum gas (40.46 units)
- **Pipes** (46 pipes) connecting refinery to storage

### Chemical Production Setup
- **Chemical plant** at position (37.5, 22.5) - Recipe set to sulfur production, not powered
- **Power poles** network with 435 poles, voltage at 4.29MW

## ERROR TIPS

### Fluid System Connection Issues
- Verify source has fluid before connecting (chemical plant connection failed due to empty source)
- Check connection point availability (oil refinery index error)
- Ensure proper spacing between connection points (repeated pipe connection failures)
- Confirm fluid types match between source and target (chemical plant input requirements)

### Power System Verification
- Confirm power connection before asserting working status (refinery power verification)
- Check all entities in power network are properly connected (steam engine connection issue)
- Verify power supply meets demand (chemical plant power issues)

### Entity Placement Errors
- Move within placement range before attempting to place entities (wooden chest placement)
- Clear target position before placing new entities (existing object conflicts)
- Verify placement coordinates are valid (position assertion errors)

### System Validation
- Verify all system components before asserting working state
- Check fluid levels in connected systems
- Monitor power consumption vs production
- Define all required variables before use (output_chest reference)

### Programming Best Practices
- Validate array indices before access (refinery connection points)
- Check entity status before assertions
- Implement proper error handling for connection attempts
- Handle None cases in entity lookups (power network rebuilding)

## NAMESPACE

### Functions
- `connect_fluid_system(source: Entity, target: Entity, pipe_count: int) -> bool` - Needs additional fluid validation
- `verify_power_connection(entity: Entity) -> bool` - Requires implementation to check power status

### Variables
- `steam_engine_pos: Position` - Position of steam engine needing power connection
- `refinery_pos: Position` - Location of oil refinery
- `chemical_plant_pos: Position` - Location of chemical production facility
- `output_chest_pos: Position` - Undefined target position (40.5, 22.5)
